questions.text: What are natural resources?
choices: Materials that come directly from nature
questions.correctAnswer: Materials that come directly from nature

questions.text: What are human resources?
choices: People working to produce goods and services
questions.correctAnswer: People working to produce goods and services

questions.text: What are capital resources?
choices: Goods made by people and used to produce other goods
questions.correctAnswer: Goods made by people and used to produce other goods

questions.text: What is an economic choice?
choices: A decision about where to live
The choice to buy one good over others
questions.correctAnswer: The choice to buy one good over others

questions.text: What is opportunity cost?
choices: The monetary price of a good
The next best choice given up when an economic choice is made
questions.correctAnswer: The next best choice given up when an economic choice is made

questions.text: What must be compared when making economic decisions?
choices: Opportunity cost and monetary cost with benefits
questions.correctAnswer: Opportunity cost and monetary cost with benefits
